thread.title: MARCELLI E.
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by MARCELLI E.

author: MARCELLI E.
title: MARCELLI E.
text: I spent a lot of time trying to find a fair price with a major carrier and I was able to do so through ASAP Tickets. Patricia S. was very patient and worked with me. There is a $30 fee for their service to keep in mind, but after the puchase I checked the price on other sites for the SAME flights and I saved about $300 or more. If I had purchased through the major carrier, for the same flights, I would have payed $500 more. I also purchased the insurance, which was actually cheaper than I expected it to be, but of course will not know if it will be worth it until I get to actually choose my seat and obtain the information I need through their concierge service. They did not push me to purchase it at all. It was my choice. They work with major airlines and so far I feel that they care about their clients. I give it a 4 stars, because I haven't flown yet.
